title: Off-Road Motorsports Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony
location: South Point Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, Nevada
details: The team enjoyed the evening's program and connected with off-road icons, including Rick Geiser, Evan Evans, The Weatherman & family, Nichole Johnson, and Baja Nikki. Mikal (Perilous creator) also reunited with Baja legend Sal Fish, a valued supporter of Perilous.

title: SEMA Convention
location: Las Vegas Convention Center, Las Vegas, Nevada
details: The team pitched Perilous to NEXEN Tires, VP Fuels, WD-40, FUEL Off-Road (wheels), Toyota, Honda, Nissan, and others, and attatched actor Robert Ri'chard to the roster. Sneak peak: We met with Ivan 'Ironman' Stewart, Terry Madden & the Block family... more news about their involvement soon!

title: Race for Hope
location: Estero Beach Hotel & Resort, Ensenada, Mexico
details: Come to the benefit for Mi Casa de Esperanza and several other orphanages. All donations appreciated!
